name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Developer Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **C#**, **Java**, and **ABL** development, complemented by a strong foundation in **Error Analysis**, **Database** management, and system documentation. My roles have involved working within **Ticket Systems** and **ServiceNow** platforms to enhance communication and teamwork across projects. I am fluent in both **German** and **English**, enabling effective customer orientation and collaboration in diverse environments. 
Additionally, I have a proven track record of delivering high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. My expertise includes full-stack development leveraging **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, along with comprehensive cloud experience on **Azure** and **AWS**. I have led the design of enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing. Strong knowledge in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation supports my ability to build robust applications compliant with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Furthermore, I bring hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
